statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent;
SELECT id, subscriber_id, consent_type FROM subscriber_consent WHERE id = 10;
SELECT consent_type, consent_given_at FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_given_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, subscriber_id, consent_given_at FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, subscriber_id, consent_type, consent_given_at FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id = 1 ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_given_at >= '2022-01-01' AND consent_type LIKE '%Email%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, COUNT(*) as total_consents FROM subscriber_consent GROUP BY subscriber_id HAVING total_consents > 2 ORDER BY total_consents DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT consent_type FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY consent_type;
SELECT subscriber_id, AVG(id) as avg_consent_id FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_given_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY subscriber_id ORDER BY avg_consent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT consent_description, collection_date FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_status = 'active';
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_status, collection_date FROM subscriber_consent ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_status FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_status IN ('active', 'pending') ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_description FROM subscriber_consent WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_status, collection_date FROM subscriber_consent WHERE consent_status = 'Active' AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;

SELECT s.subscriber_id, s.consent_status, l.log_id, l.log_timestamp FROM subscriber_consent s JOIN consent_log l ON s.subscriber_id = l.subscriber_id WHERE s.consent_status = 'Active' AND l.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.log_timestamp DESC;

SELECT s.consent_status, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM subscriber_consent s JOIN consent_log l ON s.subscriber_id = l.subscriber_id GROUP BY s.consent_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM consent_records ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_type FROM consent_records WHERE id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM subscriber_details WHERE subscriber_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM data_collection WHERE data_type = 'Sensitive' AND collected_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_content FROM data_collection ORDER BY data_id;
SELECT * FROM consent_records ORDER BY consent_type DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, first_name, last_name FROM subscriber_details WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT subscriber_id, data_type, collected_date FROM data_collection WHERE subscriber_id = 101 ORDER BY collected_date ASC;
SELECT id, subscriber_id, consent_type, consent_date FROM consent_records WHERE consent_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_collection WHERE data_type LIKE '%personal%' AND data_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberConsent WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_date FROM SubscriberConsent WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT data_id, data_type FROM DataCollection WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DataUsage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT retention_id, retention_period FROM DataRetention WHERE data_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SubscriberConsent ORDER BY consent_date DESC, subscriber_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_id, collection_date, data_type FROM DataCollection WHERE data_type LIKE 'Personal%' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT usage_id, usage_date, purpose FROM DataUsage WHERE purpose = 'Analysis' OR purpose = 'Reporting' ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT retention_id, retention_period FROM DataRetention WHERE retention_period > 365 ORDER BY retention_period ASC, retention_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM SubscriberConsent INNER JOIN DataCollection ON SubscriberConsent.subscriber_id = DataCollection.subscriber_id ORDER BY SubscriberConsent.consent_date ASC, DataCollection.collection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent;
SELECT subscriber_id, consent_date FROM subscriber_consent WHERE data_collection_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_details ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscriber_details WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT subscriber_id, country, city FROM subscriber_location WHERE postal_code LIKE '9%';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_consent WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM subscriber_details WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
SELECT city, country FROM subscriber_location WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, collection_date, data_collected FROM data_collection_logs WHERE subscriber_id = 4;
SELECT subscriber_id, usage_date, data_used FROM data_usage_logs WHERE log_id = 5;
